title: En ru an khai kang hmelmaten
lyrics:
En r'u, an khai kang hmelmaten,
Remna siamtu tur chu;
Pathian Fapa ngei a lo ni,
Kalvari thing anchhe dawnga thi kha.

A tho leh ta, a tho leh ta e,
Fak r'u, kan Chhandamtu a tho leh e;
Ropuiin a hmelma a hneh zo,
Kumkhuanin mi thianghlimte nen ro an rel.

A ruang puan nem tein an tuam,
Pathian ram beiseiten;
Huan thlan ruakah chuan an zalh a,
Hnehna ropui nen a tho leh ta e.

Thlan atangin a tho leh ta,
Chhandamtu Lalber chu,
Thlan thim atangin a lo chhuak,
Khawvel sual leh thihna a hneh zo ta.

Thihna ngei chu a ngam zo ta,
Hnehtu ropui fak r'u;
Haleluia, kan Chhandamtu,
Fakin khawvel zaiin lo khat leh rawh.
